title: Bug 13620: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with a large amount of white space
OB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page displays excessive white space around the text on the page, making it look unprofessional and negatively affecting the user experience.
EB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page should have an appropriate amount of white space around the text, ensuring a clean and professional appearance for a better user experience.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Load a project from the repository. 2) Select a source folder. 3) Open the Properties dialog. 4) Select 'Java Source Attachment.' 5) Observe the excessive white space around the text on the page.
